name: Harold V. HOSKINS, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF LYCOMING COUNTY, Judge N.L. Butts, Respondents
name_abbreviation: Hoskins v. Court of Common Pleas of Lycoming County

parties: Harold V. HOSKINS, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF LYCOMING COUNTY, Judge N.L. Butts, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 12th day of May, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED, and the Prothonotary is DIRECTED to strike the name of the jurist from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
114 A.3d 830
Harold V. HOSKINS, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF LYCOMING COUNTY, Judge N.L. Butts, Respondents.
No. 62 MM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 12, 2015.
